name: boxed::convert::<impl core::convert::From<boxed::Box<T, A>> for core::pin::Pin<boxed::Box<T, A>>>::from
doc: Converts a `Box` into a `Pin>`. If `T` does not implement [`Unpin`], then `*boxed` will be pinned in memory and unable to be moved. This conversion does not allocate on the heap and happens in place. This is also available via [`Box::into_pin`]. Constructing and pinning a `Box` with >>::from([Box::new]\(x)) can also be written more concisely using [Box::pin]\(x). This `From` implementation is useful if you already have a `Box`, or you are constructing a (pinned) `Box` in a different way than with [`Box::new`].
